string.value: You should ask Rooney about the article on Santa Claus.

Rooney felt bad that most Maplers don't believe in Santa Claus anymore. She also mentioned that this is caused by the loss of #bSanta Encyclopedias#k in the town library. She asked that you gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias that the monsters have stolen. Remember, not only is it meaningful to gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias, but also something good will happen while searching for those books.

#t4161043# #b#c4161043##k/1 
#t4161038# #b#c4161038##k/1 
#t4161039# #b#c4161039##k/1 
#t4161040# #b#c4161040##k/1 
#t4161041# #b#c4161041##k/1 
#t4161042# #b#c4161042##k/1

Just like Rooney had mentioned, a lot of good things happened to you while searching for the 6 Santa Encyclopedias. Since you did all those good deeds, Santa is certainly coming to town. More importantly, Maplers will now believe in Santa Claus!
Oh, you are the one who wished me a Merry Christmas previously. Did you still have something to say to me?

Hmm, you came here to find out about the article on Santa Claus just like the other reporters.\nI read the newspaper this morning, too. I heard that Santa Claus was very disappointed at the fact that many Maplers do not believe in his existence anymore, and that it made him call a strike this year!

Well, Maplers believed in Santa Claus at first. There used to be a book known as the #bSanta Encyclopedia#k in the library of Happyville. Maplers began to believe in the existence of Santa Claus after reading this book. However, monsters with huge appetites literally devoured them all and they're all gone now.
If we can bring that book to life again, Maplers will begin returning to their belief in Santa Claus! Can you help Maplers reshape their faith in Santa Claus?

Yes! I knew you would do it! Please find all #bSanta Encyclopedia#k from #bNo.1 ~ No.6#k! If you can find that, we can make a complete set of Santa Encyclopedia. Oh, almost forgot to mention, while you are looking for Santa Encyclopedia, something nice will happen to you. Trust me on this!
You don't care whether Santa Claus comes to our town or not?
Did you collect all 6 Santa Encyclopedia?

Excellent! How brilliant of you to get all thes Santa Encyclopedia!\nWhat? You met with Mrs. Santa making the socks and got the present from Santa Claus? Wow~ There were so many good things happened while you were finding this complete set of Encyclopedia~ Now you too believe in Santa Claus right?\nThanks to you, Maplers will start to believe in Santa Claus again.
I see that you are trying hard to get all 6 Santa Encyclopedia but quite not finished yet. You will be able to find these items from monsters.

While you are finding all 6 Santa Encyclopedia, you will be able to find some people from Happyville who need your hands. It is important to find the Santa Encyclopedia but don't forget that helping others counts just the same.
